ComicInfo.Title: Exiled on Earth!
ComicInfo.Summary: Exiled on Earth!: Odin is angry with Thor because he shouted at him. Nevertheless, Odin repairs the damage to buildings and restores creatures mutated by Ego-Prime to their human forms, clothing and all. Thor and his comrades relax at Avengers Mansion and in popular tourist spots around New York. However, one by one, they are abducted by Mephisto.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:35:27. [Issue ID 25561]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Iron Man [Tony Stark],Tana Nile,Hildegarde,Silas Grant,Edwin Jarvis,Balder,Kamorr,Sif,Volstagg],Fandral,Karl Sarron (introduction),Warriors Three [Hogun,Odin,Heimdall,Thor [Donald Blake],Odin's Vizier,Mephisto,Karnilla
